name: AVAudioEnvironmentNode
desc: An object that simulates a 3D audio environment.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new environment node object.

items.name: var listenerPosition: AVAudio3DPoint
items.desc: The listener’s position in the 3D environment.

items.name: var listenerAngularOrientation: AVAudio3DAngularOrientation
items.desc: The listener’s angular orientation in the environment.

items.name: var listenerVectorOrientation: AVAudio3DVectorOrientation
items.desc: The listener’s vector orientation in the environment.

items.name: var distanceAttenuationParameters: AVAudioEnvironmentDistanceAttenuationParameters
items.desc: The distance attenuation parameters for the environment.

items.name: var reverbParameters: AVAudioEnvironmentReverbParameters
items.desc: The reverb parameters for the environment.

items.name: var applicableRenderingAlgorithms: [NSNumber]
items.desc: An array of rendering algorithms applicable to the environment node.
